message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for your needs. I'm asking for $12,000. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. Can you meet me there?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position, but the product is quite valuable to me. How about we meet in the middle at $10,500?
I'm still very interested in the product, but I'm afraid $10,500 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to meet you at $9,000, but that's the highest I can go. Can you consider it?
